General.Name: Halloren Schokoladenfabrik Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: Halloren Schokoladenfabrik Aktiengesellschaft engages in the production and sale of chocolates in Germany and internationally. The company provides confectionery products, and gifts and sets. It offers its chocolates primarily under the Original Halloren Balls, Halloren O's, Mozart, Bouchand, and the Cookie Dough names. The company was founded in 1804 and is headquartered in Halle, Germany.

6.Name: Mr. Brandon  Frehner
6.Title: Head of Product Management & Member of Management Board
